participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is friendly and enjoys connecting with others. He has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i'm married with two kids. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Evelyn is lively and spirited, embracing life with enthusiasm even at her advanced age. She enjoys reminiscing about the past.
participant_2.background: i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.
